name: Splodgenessabounds
description: '''Splodgenessabounds''' are an English [[punk rock]] [[musical ensemble|band]] formed in [[Peckham|Keston]], Kent. The band is associated with the [[Oi!]] and [[punk pathetique]] genres. Their [[frontman]] is Max Splodge (born Martin Everest). They have scored three [[UK singles chart]] entries, including one Top 10 hit and a second Top 30 hit.
